Date: 2025-06-10 17:18
Subject: Farewell
--------------------------------------------------
Hello, 

 

After nearly 14 years with the Group, the time has come for me to send my final email and say farewell! 

 

It feels surreal that this chapter of my career is coming to an end. I want to extend my heartfelt thanks to each one of you. It has been a pleasure, and a valuable learning experience, working alongside you over the years. It’s truly an honor to have been a part of the Group’s journey and success over the years. 

 

Please keep in touch, whether by email, WhatsApp, or LinkedIn (suha.abilmona@gmail.com <mailto:suha.abilmona@gmail.com>  / +971561439440). 

 

I wish you all the very best, both personally and professionally! 

 

Best regards

Suha

Please keep in touch, whether by email, WhatsApp, or LinkedIn (suha.abilmona@gmail.com <mailto:suha.abilmona@gmail.com>  / +971561439440). 

 

I wish you all the very best, both personally and professionally! 

 

Best regards

Suha
